channel.title: Extended Multi-Texturing
channel.description:
yes how would i be able to get it to work on a Nivida Riva TNT2 Model 64/Model 64 pro? because i wanna try out runescape hd and thats really the only thing thats needed and im on a low budget so dont suggest some million dollor graphic card.
Thanks

item.title: Extended Multi-Texturing
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The good old Riva TNT2, that is the card I had in the first computer I ever built, my model had 16mb of RAM. You are going to need a new video card if you want to play any new games, you might need to upgrade other things as well, depending on your setup. You can get a fairly good one for less than $100 probably, tell us what you have and we can help.

Read full topic

item.title: Extended Multi-Texturing
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

VB7 Rocks:

Also if we’re expected to help you select a new graphics card, we’re going to need more information about your current setup… What sort of motherboard do you have? I’m assuming it’s ancient as well…

Probably a new PSU too.

Read full topic
